head.title: seminar 2009-11-30: new metadata formats@kb.dk

ul.li: slide 1 the ecosystem of metadata in libraries is a complicated one
slide 2 libraries collect, preserve, organize and provide access to information ressources
slide 3 library users should be able to find identify select and optain access to information resources
slide 4 users use the library catalog
slide 5 traditionally the information has been obtained in books
slide 6 books are retrieved at the circulation desk
slide 7 users need to find, not search

h2.span:
metadata is not just about the resource as a whole object
a search and navigation system requires a content model
describing its internal structure

ul.li:
slide 9 why are there so few of our images in google images?
slide 10 well, we didn't adhere to the architecture of the world wide web
slide 11
we have relied on the library catalog for dissemination
most metadata have not been available on the web
slide 12
conquistadores and incas
slide 13 peruvian traffic
slide 14 Guaman Poma de Ayala's family
slide 12 mods and mets new metadata formats&kb.dk

h2.span:
metadata is not just about the resource as a whole object
a search and navigation system requires a content model
describing its internal structure
